title: Flatland
creator_credit: Edwin Abbot, Harvard University and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: An animated mathematical allegory by Edwin Abbot about a square who discovers the third dimension, but is jailed by the two-dimensional inhabitants of Flatland when he preaches multidimensionality. Also offers a universal social commentary on social structures and values. Suitable for lower secondary level.
